item.title: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025
bullets: Buy or sell stocks: The Indian stock market ended flat on Friday, September 5, on profit booking as concerns over Trump tariffs and their
The Sensex and the Nifty 50 market benchmarks opened higher but failed to hold gains despite positive global cues on expectations of a US
The Sensex slipped 7 points to end at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 ended at 24,741, up 7 points.
The BSE Midcap index fell 0.10 per cent, while the Smallcap index increased by 0.09 per cent.

item.title: TN forms panel to probe alleged gas leak at Cuddalore SIPCOT unit
